Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: Since a politician never believes what he says, he is quite surprised to be taken at his word

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: France cannot be France without greatness

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: How can anyone govern a nation that has two hundred and forty-six different kinds of cheese?

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: To govern is always to choose among disadvantages

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: Treaties are like roses and young girls. They last while they last

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: I respect only those who resist me, but I cannot tolerate them

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action, of one alone

Quote.Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote.QuoteValue: No country without an atom bomb could properly consider itself independent

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: The less men think, the more they talk

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: In most things success depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: No kingdom has shed more blood than the kingdom of Christ

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always observed that to succeed in the world one should seem a fool, but be wise

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: If triangles had a god, they would give him three sides

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: Lunch kills half of Paris, supper the other half

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: Luxury ruins republics; poverty, monarchies

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: There should be weeping at a man's birth, not at his death

Quote.Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never known any distress that an hour's reading did not relieve

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: Habits are malleable throughout your entire life

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you focus, the more that focus becomes a habit

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you break a habit into its components, you can fiddle with the gears

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: In a sense, habits never really disappear. Once formed, they always remain in our neurology

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: Consumer habits are key to understanding how to launch a product

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: Between calculated risk and reckless decision-making lies the dividing line between profit and loss

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: Since the 17th century, insurance agents have been the foremost experts on risk

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: If Freddie Mac is unable to raise capital, it could spark a political and financial crisis

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: There are supply chains that exist in China and Asia now which the U.S. simply can't replicate

Quote.Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote.QuoteValue: America is the Saudi Arabia of coal

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Westminster is a jungle - and the hunter can always smell fear on its prey

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing we can all be sure about in politics is you are as well to expect the unexpected

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is a peculiar kind of fear

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a fully paid-up member of the human race

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually, I think it's quite sensible not to take yourself too seriously

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not someone who dwells upon past events, taking the view that life is too short

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: My health is good and it's up to me to keep it that way

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: With 24-hour news... the story moves on with the media

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am genuinely not an over-the-top kind of person about politics or anything else

Quote.Author: Charles Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I will go out of this world feet first with my Lib Dem membership card in my pocket

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: No one would have crossed the ocean if he could have gotten off the ship in the storm

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to kill any idea in the world, get a committee working on it

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: A problem well stated is a problem half-solved

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: An inventor is simply a fellow who doesn't take his education too seriously

Quote.Author: Charles Kettering
Quote.QuoteValue: One fails forward toward success

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: All we need to make us really happy is something to be enthusiastic about

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Feelings are like chemicals, the more you analyze them the worse they smell

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is no evil, unless it conquers us

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Do noble things, not dream them all day long

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Have thy tools ready. God will find thee work

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Young blood must have its course, lad, and every dog its day

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Be good, sweet maid, and let who will be clever

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no use doing a kindness if you do it a day too late

Quote.Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Except a living man, there is nothing more wonderful than a book

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: You can find your way across this country using burger joints the way a navigator uses stars

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: The everyday kindness of the back roads more than makes up for the acts of greed in the headlines

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to think that driving, sleepless, ambitious labor was what you needed to succeed

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: We always take credit for the good and attribute the bad to fortune

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that writing is derivative. I think good writing comes from good reading

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: Just by luck, I picked good heroes to worship

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: Look for joy in your life; it's not always easy to find

Quote.Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote.QuoteValue: There is such a thing as a national conscience, and it can be touched

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: My motto is: Contented with little, yet wishing for more

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Here cometh April again, and as far as I can see the world hath more fools in it than ever

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is a gaming animal. He must always be trying to get the better in something or other

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: The beggar wears all colors fearing none

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Lawyers, I suppose, were children once

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing puzzles me more than the time and space; and yet nothing troubles me less

Quote.Author: Charles Lamb
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is life - the sharper, the more evidence of life

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had to choose, I would rather have birds than airplanes

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized that If I had to choose, I would rather have birds than airplanes

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Isn't it strange that we talk least about the things we think about most?

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Real freedom lies in wildness, not in civilization

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: We must learn from the sermons of Christ, the wisdom of Laotzu, the teachings of Buddha

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is no longer endless or the horizon destitute of hope

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Flying a good airplane doesn't require near as much attention as a motor car

Quote.Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had enough publicity for 15 lives

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like a ten speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: No problem is too big to run away from

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love mankind; it's people I can't stand

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: Big sisters are the crab grass in the lawn of life

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've discovered the secret of life - you just hang around until you get used to it

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: Decorate your home. It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is

Quote.Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the secret to life... replace one worry with another

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: I am more afraid of an army of 100 sheep led by a lion than an army of 100 lions led by a sheep

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Speech was given to man to disguise his thoughts

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Love of glory can only create a great hero; contempt of glory creates a great man

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of statesmanship is to foresee the inevitable and to expedite its occurrence

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: If we go on explaining we shall cease to understand one another

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Without freedom of the press, there can be no representative government

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: A court is an assembly of noble and distinguished beggars

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Mistrust first impulses; they are nearly always good

Quote.Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much sensibility creates unhappiness and too much insensibility creates crime

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: The bottom line in the Christian life is obedience and most people don't even like the word

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: Take steps each day to be sure your life expresses commitment to Jesus

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: God's voice is still and quiet and easily buried under an avalanche of clamour

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: His voice leads us not into timid discipleship but into bold witness

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: He wants you all to Himself to put His loving, divine arms around you

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: When God speaks, oftentimes His voice will call for an act of courage on our part

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: God will never reject you. Whether you accept Him is your decision

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: God will never tell us to do something that gratifies the flesh

Quote.Author: Charles Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: When trouble comes, focus on God's ability to care for you

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not good at dressing up fancy; I always just do my thing, which is whatever I'm in the mood for

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: The second someone tries to put me in a box, I will do everything to rebel against that

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: Being nice is awesome. You have more fun; you meet more people

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: I think big brows are pretty cool

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone that thinks 'pop' is a dirty word is living in the '90s

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: To be honest, my usual makeup is the same as in my music video looks

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been really inspired by Paris Hilton, small dogs, and a glitter, luxe lifestyle

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a really big Rihanna fan, and I think she's such an incredible artist

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: I love In-N-Out!

Quote.Author: Charli XCX
Quote.QuoteValue: The scenes in 'The Virgin Suicides' where Elle Fanning is ice skating are really amazing

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: A day without laughter is a day wasted

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: A tramp, a gentleman, a poet, a dreamer, a lonely fellow, always hopeful of romance and adventure

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it!

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's true character comes out when he's drunk

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world - not even our troubles

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is the tonic, the relief, the surcease for pain

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: All I need to make a comedy is a park, a policeman and a pretty girl

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: We think too much and feel too little

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: What do you want a meaning for? Life is a desire, not a meaning

Quote.Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote.QuoteValue: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't start singing until I was 16. I was afraid to sing in front of people

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always inspired by people who have really cool Twitter profiles

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very easy for people to put out music

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I listened to a lot of Marvin Gaye and Motown records

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I skipped class a lot

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people don't know, but New Jersey has, like, 700,000 acres of farmland

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge Marvin Gaye fan

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: If a girl sings a sexy song, I actually become even more attracted to them

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a homebody times ten

Quote.Author: Charlie Puth
Quote.QuoteValue: When Marvin Gaye made his music, he evoked this feeling that would reach everybody

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: Boom, crush. Night, losers. Winning, duh

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of ignoring that I march to a different beat

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to tell them that last night was a shameful train wreck filled with blind cuddly puppies

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I so desperately wanted to be Mr. Somebody. Instead, I was the little brother, included to a point

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have one speed, I have one gear: go!

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm bi-winning. I win here, I win there

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I just didn't believe I was like everybody else. I thought I was unique

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I still don't have all the answers. I'm more interested in what I can do next than what I did last

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: There have to be more important things going on in the world than my past

Quote.Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote.QuoteValue: I am on a drug. It's called Charlie Sheen

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: If they ever do my life story, whoever plays me needs lots of hair color and high heels

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: I am human, and, yeah, I have very bad days

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to get pajamas. Good, nice and warm flannel ones

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of myself as a highly sexual creature

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: Hey, I'm a girl, and we like to play dress-up

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean I tried to transform myself through characters throughout my career

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: I think in life we want to challenge ourselves

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: I think today women are very scared to celebrate themselves, because then they just get labeled

Quote.Author: Charlize Theron
Quote.QuoteValue: You are only as great as the opportunities that are given to you

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to avoid looking forward or backward, and try to keep looking upward

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is so constructed, that the event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: True enthusiasm is a fine feeling whose flash I admire where-ever I see it

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: Let your performance do the thinking

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are cast in a different mould to the majority, it is no merit of yours: Nature did it

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one difference between a madman and me. I am not mad

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel monotony and death to be almost the same

Quote.Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote.QuoteValue: Better to be without logic than without feeling

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to get up and ride my horses, do what I love doing. I don't want to be recognised

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every horse I get on I can adapt to. It's like a jigsaw puzzle

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: I love having horses from a young age and seeing how far they can go

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: I never set goals

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: All you can do is to do your best

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to believe in yourself

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really lucky that I can control my nerves; it doesn't seem to get to me

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: People recognise me now. I've got so much fan mail

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: People tell me I'm their idol and a huge inspiration - that's really surreal

Quote.Author: Charlotte Dujardin
Quote.QuoteValue: I literally worked from the bottom up to where I am now

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a wish. It as a fear as well - that in my end will be my beginning

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is argument carried out by other means

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: The only passion that guides me is for the truth... I look at everything from this point of view

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot be sure of having something to live for unless we are willing to die for it

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: I know you are here to kill me. Shoot, coward, you are only going to kill a man

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember that the revolution is what is important, and each one of us, alone, is worth nothing

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: Study hard so that you can master technology, which allows us to master nature

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: If you tremble with indignation at every injustice, then you are a comrade of mine

Quote.Author: Che Guevara
Quote.QuoteValue: Cruel leaders are replaced only to have new leaders turn cruel

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason we're so dangerous is because we're totally harmless

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I'm the go-to guy for Mexican priests

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: I love voice work

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: Mexicans are quasi-legal

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the plays in baseball, stealing home is by far the most exciting

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to want to be Chicano to be Chicano

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, sometimes you need the fields to lie fallow in order to gain nutrients

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every kid that goes to Catholic school believes he's going to be a priest one day

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: Loyalty and communication are always rewarded in sports

Quote.Author: Cheech Marin
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I used to go to the library and take out all the art books

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Determination gets you a long way

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: For most of my life, I did deliberately lead a private life and inadvertently led a public life

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: People recognize me. Most people are really nice. Sometimes people say, 'Hi, Chelsea.'

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely taught my parents how to text and how to charge their phones

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: We need Hollywood to make movies and television shows about sexy female engineers

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother is very good in Scrabble. In Boggle, my father is probably better

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a boyfriend and a dog, and I still haven't figured out what I want to be when I grow up

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day at some point I encounter some sort of anti-American feeling

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to make a positive, productive contribution, as cheesy as that may sound

Quote.Author: Chelsea Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really grateful I grew up in a house in which media literacy was a survival skill

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't fast-forward heartbreak, and you can't rewind love - and that's just one big bummer

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very much about letting other people shine, because it makes us all shine brighter

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: We women have to stick together

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love a stupid joke, something that doesn't make any sense

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm a good host. I'm not a good host. I'm terrible at hosting. That's my problem

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: Have you ever been sued by a midget? It's not fun

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: Jews are underdogs - not in my world, obviously, they're not

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think nudity is funny, especially when it's inappropriate

Quote.Author: Chelsea Handler
Quote.QuoteValue: Jennifer Aniston is one of the most down-to-earth, low-key people I know

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: If you really want something you can figure out how to make it happen

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't take your toys inside just because it's raining

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: Men aren't necessities. They're luxuries

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always taken risks, and never worried what the world might really think of me

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing - and then marry him

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: I can trust my friends These people force me to examine myself, encourage me to grow

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: Husbands are like fires - they go out when they're left unattended

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm learning English at the moment. I can say 'Big Ben', 'Hello Rodney', 'Tower Bridge' and 'Loo'

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: In this business it takes time to be really good - and by that time, you're obsolete

Quote.Author: Cher
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are the real architects of society

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I look so straight and normal, nobody expects me to pick my nose and fall

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who wants to run has to be a Jimmy Swaggart, minus the default

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: All my children inherited perfect pitch

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Chevy Chase, and you're not

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: It's never a good idea for a celebrity to sign autographs or take pictures if a crowd is gathering

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: Every Vacation movie didn't just make the studio money. They each made the studio a lot of money

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: We never could have performed live for an hour and a half every week if we were doing drugs

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: Parrots make great pets. They have more personality than goldfish

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always the guy getting kicked out of my classes at school for having an attitude problem

Quote.Author: Chevy Chase
Quote.QuoteValue: You could knock my teeth out and break my nose, and there'd be something funny about it to me

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: This mix of willingness and passion made me the businesswoman I am now
